html:
6.28.17  3:01 am   Just a suggestion regarding the reality videos on youtube: you could make the videos private (non-searchable) (and you could do that on some secondary channel too) and only link to them from the reality section here on your webpage. That could solve the "being all over youtube" problem. I am not sure what the issue with the dates would be...

     anyway I hope you are having a good day and have some more fantastic content coming up
6.28.17  2:53 am   CAN YOU NUKE NORTH KOREA!?!?!!?!?!!

6.28.17  2:02 am   Would you make a video series? Contact me at ****@****. My name is Andy and I am trying to found a new religion. I hope you respond soon, as my bouts of depression are rapidly outpacing my financial progress.
6.28.17  1:49 am   is there a song you regret writing or a lyric you regret putting into a song you've released?
6.28.17  1:28 am   This is a dumb question but can I write music and make it sound good even though I know nothing about music theory except for the very basics?
6.28.17  1:14 am   What do you think is holding you back the most in terms of being able to make longer videos?
6.28.17  12:17 am   i'm glad you're updating your reality page but can you skip those videos to... May/June 2017? i don't want to wait 3 years.
6.28.17  12:13 am   so what's the next video gonna be about?
6.27.17  11:56 pm   Would you say that your product comes in massive spikes, or is it relatively constant? (I fall into the former category.)
6.27.17  11:52 pm   Are you going to do more history videos? Like world and japan? Already have something in mind?

6.27.17  11:47 pm   Are you still going to make videos, or uploading them to youtube?

      I enjoy all of them, or at least the ones I've watched. The videos of Japan and The History of the World are fantastic, and it would be cool if you continue to make those kind of videos.

     Thanks and bye.
6.27.17  10:58 pm   Why didn't you answer my weight loss tip question?
6.27.17  10:38 pm   you are like the only youtuber that has 1mil+ subs that doesn't scream "HEY WASSUP ITS YA BOI" maybe you should do that at the start of your next video ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

6.27.17  10:18 pm   can you put your reality videos on youtube? they're not loading very well on your website since you're self-hosting them and even uploading them under some second channel like billwurtz2 will help them be appreciated more while also loading much faster and being easier to access and organize
6.27.17  10:00 pm   have you considered adding a favicon to your site? a little umbrella would look really cute
6.27.17  9:58 pm   have you ever considered using a margin top on the donate button instead of this monstrosity? http://i.imgur.com/2Oz5EcX.png

6.27.17  9:56 pm   bill, BILL, this is a dire situation and i cannot keep my feelings repressed any longer. while most of your website is in wonderful times, THIS TEXTBOX AND THE ASK BUTTON ARE IN HELVETICA. this makes me very uncomfortable and i would like this situation resolved immediatley http://i.imgur.com/LsE7Uk8.png
6.27.17  9:07 pm   do you keep notes
6.27.17  7:50 pm   when was the last time you created a link for a question that multiple people have asked
6.27.17  7:13 pm   What was your reaction when Vine closed down?
6.27.17  6:00 pm   Do you like rocks
6.27.17  2:54 pm   What do you think about how you don't really need a good voice to become a pop star these days?
6.27.17  2:28 pm   is my life meaningless?
6.27.17  2:10 pm   whats your new strategy for songs and videos?
6.27.17  1:43 pm   Will you ever do a video about yourself/your life at some point?

6.27.17  12:53 pm   When 'nothing' is defined, does it uncease to not be or cease to be? I mean, when I call nothing 'it', it feels like I ruined nothing, and something else aswell. What do you think (about this)?
6.27.17  12:47 pm   Are you Barbara Streisand?
6.27.17  10:57 am   for your short Q&A videos, where did you get the questions from?
6.27.17  9:51 am   why is going home such a common theme in your songs
6.27.17  6:28 am   How were you able to do a song a week and have time to make vine videos everyday back then?
6.27.17  6:03 am   Are you retarded?
6.27.17  5:39 am   what do you think?
6.27.17  5:00 am   what's the strategy for doing songs and videos at a reasonable pace ?
6.27.17  3:56 am   Are you a musical instrument?
6.27.17  2:58 am   Is it possible to learn piano left handed?
6.27.17  2:46 am   so what the plan to make content without blowing up with stress?

6.27.17  1:12 am   You say that yo prefer the use of 'haha' over 'lol' or 'lmao'. However, don't you feel it may come of as sarcastic at times? Like, someone sends you a joke and you say 'haha.'am i just being paranoid?
6.27.17  1:06 am   BILL WHY DO YOU USE LOWERCASE LETTERS SO MUCH
6.27.17  12:19 am   what is the significance of "1 lovely drive" in i can play? or did you just pick a random address
6.27.17  12:18 am   are you ever going to update the scramble page?

6.26.17  11:20 pm   can you handle horror movies?
6.26.17  11:12 pm   have you ever watched Bob Ross? Thoughts on his art?
6.26.17  10:52 pm   Did you work on the style of comedy that you use, or is it just nature? Also, this isn't a question, but thanks for having a questions page!
6.26.17  10:35 pm   Sup dude, what's that new strategy for songs and videos you talked about?
6.26.17  10:00 pm   songwriting advice?

6.26.17  9:18 pm   did you give up on this page

6.26.17  7:11 pm   Are you the real Bill Wurtz, or is this just a fan-made site? How do we know you're really you?
